en.title: Choosing an Air Purifier for Cat Allergies | The Importance of HEPA Filters
en.content:
An air purifier is an essential item for managing cat allergies. By choosing the right product, you can significantly reduce indoor allergens.

Why a HEPA Filter Is Essential

A True HEPA filter (JIS standard compliant) can capture 99.97% or more of particles as small as 0.3µm. Since the cat allergen Fel d1 has a particle size of approximately 2.5µm or larger, a HEPA filter can reliably capture it.

Be cautious of labels such as "HEPA-type," "HEPA-like," or "HEPA-grade." These differ from True HEPA and may have significantly lower filtration performance. Always choose a filter labeled "True HEPA" or "JIS standard compliant."

5 Key Points for Choosing an Air Purifier

1. Choose a model rated for at least 1.5 times your room size. 2. Select one with easy filter replacement and readily available replacement filters. 3. Pick a quiet model (important for sleeping). 4. A deodorizing filter helps with pet odors too. 5. A pre-filter that catches cat hair first is a plus.

Effective Placement and Usage

Ideally, place one unit in each room where your cat spends time and one in the bedroom. Run them 24 hours a day and replace filters according to the recommended schedule. When using alongside an air conditioner, place the air purifier in a corner of the room perpendicular to the AC airflow for maximum efficiency.

At Fuluck Cattery, we run multiple air purifiers to maintain a clean air environment.

zh.title: 猫过敏空气净化器选购指南 | HEPA滤芯的重要性
zh.content:
空气净化器是应对猫过敏的必备物品。选择合适的产品，可以大幅减少室内过敏原。

为什么必须选择HEPA滤芯

True HEPA滤芯（符合JIS标准）能够捕获99.97%以上的0.3µm微粒。猫过敏原Fel d1的颗粒大小约为2.5µm以上，因此HEPA滤芯可以有效捕获。

需要注意"HEPA型"、"类HEPA"、"HEPA级"等标注。这些与True HEPA不同，过滤性能可能大幅下降。请务必选择标注为"True HEPA"或"符合JIS标准"的滤芯。

选购空气净化器的5个要点

①选择适用面积为房间面积1.5倍以上的型号。②选择易于更换滤芯且替换滤芯容易购买的产品。③选择运行噪音低的型号（为了睡眠质量）。④带除臭滤芯的产品还能应对宠物异味。⑤带预过滤网的产品可以先拦截猫毛。

有效的摆放和使用方法

理想的做法是在猫经常待的房间和卧室各放一台。基本上需要24小时运行，按推荐周期更换滤芯。与空调同时使用时，将空气净化器放在房间角落，与空调气流垂直的位置，效率更高。

福楽猫舍也运行着多台空气净化器，维持清洁的空气环境。
